text.div:
SubscriptionTag

Tags to put on a resource after subscriptions have been sent.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/subscription-tag defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
queued QueuedThe message has been queued for processing on a destination systems.
delivered DeliveredThe message has been delivered to its intended recipient.

name: SubscriptionTag
description: Tags to put on a resource after subscriptions have been sent.

concept.definition: The message has been queued for processing on a destination systems.
The message has been delivered to its intended recipient.
